name: Devil Wolf
description:
This is my first making a  unity game,i'm still learning!

I'm join on #devtober  activities,hope I can finish it on time because I  need to go to school.

Temporarily, I have the basic planning and implementation scenarios for Menu scenes and Events scenes,i plan to this is a platform game.

But my english is not good,I have to translate in Google a lot of the time,please understand.

Welcome propose any comments!
